N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 23.3 - Payment for overtime accruals upon appointment, promotion or transfer

State Regulations

An employee who is appointed, promoted or transferred from
one department or agency to another shall be compensated in cash by the
department or agency from which he is so appointed, promoted or transferred for
such of his overtime credits up to 30 days as cannot be liquidated by
compensatory time off prior to such appointment, promotion or transfer. An
employee who is appointed, promoted or transferred from one unit or institution
to another within the same department or agency in the Office of Mental Health, the Office of Mental Retardation and Developmental Disabilities, the Department
of Health, the Department of Correctional Services, or the Division for Youth, or within the State University, shall not be compensated in cash for overtime
but such credits shall be transferred to the new unit or institution with the
employee. Notes
